Create two dimensional scatter plot

plot_features.Rd

Create two dimensional scatter plot

plot_features(
  obj_in,
  x = "UMAP_1",
  y = "UMAP_2",
  feature,
  data_slot = "data",
  pt_size = 0.25,
  plot_cols = NULL,
  feat_levels = NULL,
  split_id = NULL,
  split_levels = NULL,
  min_pct = NULL,
  max_pct = NULL,
  lm_line = F,
  cor_label = c(0.8, 0.9),
  label_size = 3.7,
  ...
)

Arguments

obj_in

Seurat object or data.frame containing data for plotting
x

Variable to plot on x-axis
y

Variable to plot on y-axis
feature

Variable to use for coloring points
data_slot

Slot in the Seurat object to pull data from
pt_size

Point size
plot_cols

Vector of colors to use for plot
feat_levels

Levels to use for ordering feature
split_id

Variable to use for splitting plot into facets
split_levels

Levels to use for ordering plot facets
min_pct

Minimum value to plot for feature
max_pct

Maximum value to plot for feature
lm_line

Add regression line to plot
cor_label

Position of correlation coefficient label
label_size

Size of correlation coefficient label
...

Additional parameters to pass to facet_wrap

Value

ggplot object
